short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sometimes your browser needs a bar of soap. Say goodbye to profanity, adult content, and bad vibes!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Swear Guard, the tool for keeping your online presence squeaky clean! With Swear Guard, you can browse the web without worrying about accidentally stumbling upon an adult site or coming across inappropriate language. Swear Guard's advanced technology not only censors profanity, but also blocks adult websites and removes posts and comments with bad keywords.

No more awkward moments at work or embarrassing slip-ups with family and friends - Swear Guard has got you covered. And with its easy-to-use chrome extension, you can enjoy a clean online experience with just a few clicks. Whether you're a parent looking to protect your children, or a professional who wants to maintain a positive online image, Swear Guard is the perfect tool for you. Say goodbye to inappropriate content and hello to a cleaner, more professional online presence with Swear Guard!


We value your privacy. We do not collect or store your browsing history or personal data.
